name: Uprooted! GGJ23
description:
Harvest root crops before the bugs eat them and sell your stash before it rots. Instructions:

Drag and drop root crops into their baskets. Sell them before they rot. Can you meet the demands of your farm boss?

Made for the Global Game Jam 2023. South Africa represent!

Credits:

Game Design: Richard Bolland, Andrew Kerr, Jeremy Westwood.

Programming: Richard Bolland, Jeremy Westwood and ChatGPT!

Art and Assets: Richard Bolland and Darren Brown.

Copywriting: Simon van Wyk.

Music: Simon van Wyk.

Game Testing: Jake Waldron, Kirsten Harri, Garth Jephthah, Jason Jenkinson, Tracy Pitseng, Princess Kabeya

SFX: https://motionsound.io/
